kvhc.player
Class Channel

java.lang.Object
  kvhc.player.Channel

public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object

The Channel class manages a channel containing a number of steps and a sound to play for each active step

Author:
kvhc

Constructor Summary
Channel()
          Constructor for an empty channel Default number of steps: 16
Channel(Sound sound)
          Constructor for a channel with a sound Default number of steps: 16
Channel(Sound sound, int steps)
          Constructor for a channel with a sound and a specific number of steps
